title: The declaration of both houses of Parliament concerning His Maiesties letter to the privy councell of the kingdome of Scotland And the petition of the noblemen, gentlemen, ministers, &c. of Scotland, to the Lords of the Privy Councell.
author: England and Wales. Parliament.
publisher: Printed for Joseph Hunscot and Iohn Wright,
notes: Parliament has read a letter from the King and a petition of Scots nobility, &c., to the Privy council at Edinburgh. The suffering there expressed are not owing to Parliament, which has laboured to take the blame off the King and throw it on his ministers. .. -- Steele.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
Order to print dated: Mercurii 15 Iunii. 1642. Signed: Io. Brown. Cleric. Parliament.
